pre_conversation.line: Hey choom, how's it going?
Don't be such a gonk.
This code is drek.
I need to get myself a screamer.
I'm thinking of getting some chrome installed.
Thanks for having my back, choomba.
Do you take credsticks?
How much for the job? I got eddies.
I fragged that guy in the game.
He's a gangbanger from the Valentinos.
I'm going to grab some kibble before we head out.
That guy's a real gonk. Don't listen to him.
I'm going to jack in and see what I can find.
I'm not sure if I trust that corpo.
I'm going to hit up the afterlife tonight.
I need to find a ripperdoc to fix me up.
I'm going to jack into the net and see what I can find.
That guy's got some serious chrome installed.
I'm going to grab some eddies and hit up the club tonight.
I heard there's a new braindance out. Let's check it out.
Hey, choomba. You lookin' for some kibble or some joytoy action?
Fuck off, gonk. You know I'm here for the braindance. Hook me up with the latest 'dorphs.
You got it, gato. Just don't flatline on me, okay? And watch out for the NCPD. They're cracking down on illegal BDs.
Relax, choom. I'm a pro netrunner. I can hack the Blackwall blindfolded. Now, let's chippin' in and see what this BD has to offer.
What's up, edgerunner? You lookin' for some work? I got a fixer who needs a skilled merc for a corpo job.
I'm listening, choomba. What's the gig?
It's simple. You just need to infiltrate a Militech facility and steal some cyberware. You'll need a good cyberdeck and some 'dorphs to boost your RAM.
Sounds easy enough. What's the catch?
The catch is that the facility is guarded by a borg named Adam Smasher. He's a legend in Night City. He killed Johnny Silverhand, the rockerboy who led the rebellion against Arasaka.
Adam Smasher? Are you fucking kidding me? That's suicide, choom. No amount of eddies is worth that.
Hey, doll. You lookin' for some fun? I can make your dreams come true.
No thanks, joytoy. I'm not interested in your flatlined services.
Come on, don't be bourgy. I'm not like those other dolls. I have a personality and a soul.
Sure you do, choomba. And I'm a corpo with a heart of gold.
Fine, be that way. But don't come crying to me when you need some input or output.
Hey, gato. You're a rockerboy, right? I love your music. It's so apogee.
Thanks, choomba. I appreciate your support. You know, it's not easy being a rockerboy in this world of corpos and gonks.
I know, right? They're trying to silence us with their kibble and their braindances. But we won't let them. We're the culture vultures of Night City.
That's right, choom. We're the voice of the people. We're here to make a difference with our songs and our guns.
Hell yeah, gato. You're an inspiration to me. Can I get your autograph?
